short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free, instant, and comprehensive carrier vetting with a single click, directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FLEETFAX gives you free, instant access to essential FMCSA data on carriers, including registration, insurance, authority, compliance, inspections, accidents, and more—all from your browser. Instantly pull up carrier information with just an email, MC number, or DOT number in one click.

Why Choose FLEETFAX?

	•	100% free – No fees, no hidden charges.
	•	Quick & easy – One-click search makes it super easy to use.
	•	Instant results – View carrier registration, insurance, and authority status in seconds.
	•	Up-to-date data – FLEETFAX offers the latest info, directly from FMCSA & DOT databases.
	•	Seamless integration – Works within your browser, no extra tabs needed.
	•	Valuable insights – Years active, pending insurance cancellations or authority status changes can help you make informed decisions.

How It Works:

	1.	Highlight any MC number, DOT number, or email address.
	2.	Right-click and select “Search with FLEETFAX”.
	3.	Get detailed carrier info instantly in a convenient popup.

Why wait?

With FLEETFAX, verifying carriers is faster, easier, and more reliable than ever—at no cost to you. Protect your business from fraud, ensure compliance, and make smarter decisions in seconds.



Disclaimer:

I created FLEETFAX as a personal hobby project for learning, I hope you find it useful. If you have any feedback or feature requests, I’d love to hear from you. Your input helps improve FLEETFAX and ensures it remains accessible to everyone.
